main event: A mysterious object emitting flashes of colored light was sighted east south east of Dobbins Air Force Base in Marietta, Georgia.
interesting points: The object appeared to be suspended and circular in shape, then the light appeared to cast off a light and general colors and return to the stationary suspense light.
The object appeared to drop directly to the ground several times during the night.
The object never appeared to have wings or give off exhaust or vapor trails.
The object was too low to be observed from ground level and appeared to be approximately 520 ft high.
The shape of the object was unknown and the size was undetermined, but it emitted colored light.
sighted object: a mysterious object emitting flashes of colored light
location: Dobbins Air Force Base, Marietta, Georgia
witnesses: A1C Schwitz, a tower operator at Dobbins AFB
